dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.name: perl-cgi-simple

dependencies.description: Build structures from CGI data
dependencies.name: perl-cgi-struct

dependencies.description: Make NEXT suck less
dependencies.name: perl-class-c3-adopt-next

dependencies.description: A working (require "Class::Name") and more
dependencies.name: perl-class-load

dependencies.description: Pretty printing of data structures
dependencies.name: perl-data-dump

dependencies.description: Parse and validate simple name/value option pairs
dependencies.name: perl-data-optlist

dependencies.name: perl-hash-multivalue

dependencies.description: HTML parser class
dependencies.name: perl-html-parser

dependencies.description: HTTP Body Parser
dependencies.name: perl-http-body

dependencies.description: HTTP style message (base class)
dependencies.name: perl-http-message

dependencies.description: Use Cpanel::JSON::XS with a fallback to JSON::XS and JSON::PP
dependencies.name: perl-json-maybexs

dependencies.description:
The libwww-perl collection is a set of Perl modules which provides a
simple and consistent application programming interface to the World-
Wide Web. The main focus of the library is to provide classes and
functions that allow you to write WWW clients.
dependencies.name: perl-libwww-perl

dependencies.description: Automatically give your module the ability to have plugins
dependencies.name: perl-module-pluggable

dependencies.description: A postmodern object system for Perl 5
dependencies.name: perl-moose

dependencies.description: Emulate Class::Accessor::Fast behavior using Moose attributes
dependencies.name: perl-moosex-emulate-class-accessor-fast

dependencies.name: perl-moosex-getopt

dependencies.description: Code attribute introspection
dependencies.name: perl-moosex-methodattributes

dependencies.description: Provides several utilities for dealing with method resolution order.
dependencies.name: perl-mro-compat

dependencies.description: Keep imports and functions out of your namespace.
dependencies.name: perl-namespace-clean

dependencies.description: Cross-platform path specification manipulation
dependencies.name: perl-path-class

dependencies.description: This module provides a fast and correct UTF-8 PerlIO layer.
dependencies.name: perl-perlio-utf8-strict

dependencies.description: Perl Superglue for Web frameworks and Web Servers (PSGI toolkit)
dependencies.name: perl-plack

Plack::Middleware which sets body for redirect response, if it's not

Plack::Middleware which removes body for HTTP response if it's not
required
dependencies.name: perl-plack-middleware-removeredundantbody

dependencies.name: perl-plack-middleware-reverseproxy

dependencies.description: Call isa, can, does and DOES safely on things that may not be objects
dependencies.name: perl-safe-isa

dependencies.description: Rewrite strings based on a set of known prefixes
dependencies.name: perl-string-rewriteprefix

dependencies.description: A sophisticated exporter for custom-built routines
